amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to remove the personally identifiable information of staff or faculty required to disclose gifts and contracts in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carey amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carey amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carey amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
